roleset.name: re-accustom, re-adapting

example.name: Args 0 and 1
example.text: The patient is in physical therapy to recondition herself after surgery.

example.name: ARG2
example.text: they are tested and then reconditioned to original factory specifications

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: Their reoncditioning of inspiratory muscles involves simply removing patients from the ventilator and allowing them to breathe on their own for several minutes a day.

roleset.note: RECONDITION-V NOTES: Based on condition.02 and data in Clinical Notes corpus. Framed by Anwen Feb 2011. (from recondition.01-v)
RECONDITIONING-N NOTES: Relation to condition.02 (from reconditioning.01-n)
